item.title: RT Jo Kristian Bergum: Playing with @LangChainAI and Vespa streaming mode with multi-vector representations. LangChain has evolved for the better over...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJo Kristian Bergum
Playing with @LangChainAI and Vespa streaming mode with multi-vector representations.

LangChain has evolved for the better over the last few months, with fewer "magic" hidden prompts, and the LangChain Expression Language (LCEL) reminds me of Vespa indexing language.
item.author: LangChain

item.title: ‚≠êÔ∏èBuilding RAG Pipelines that Use Multiple LLMs: Query Transformation ‚≠êÔ∏è Many advanced RAG pipelines make multiple calls to LLMs at various stages...
item.description:
‚≠êÔ∏èBuilding RAG Pipelines that Use Multiple LLMs: Query Transformation ‚≠êÔ∏è

Many advanced RAG pipelines make multiple calls to LLMs at various stages. Most existing templates currently use the same LLM for all stages, but there's no reason that has to be the case.

Over the coming‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1731724086072779109

item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJacob Lee
üìê Gradient LLMs + Embeddings üìê

You can swap in @Gradient_AI_ private, custom-trained LLMs and embeddings into your @LangChainAI ü¶úüîó JS/TS projects!

This also includes support for model adapters.

Thank you to @ChaseMcDou!

https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/llms/gradient_ai

item.title: RT Miguel Otero Pedrido: Another fun project I made using @LangChainAI ! In this case, it's a library I created that checks for undocumented functions...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇMiguel Otero Pedrido
Another fun project I made using @LangChainAI !

In this case, it's a library I created that checks for undocumented functions / classes in your python project and generates docstrings for each one.

Code: https://github.com/MichaelisTrofficus/gpt4docstrings

item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJacob Lee
üó∫Ô∏è Google Places Tool üó∫Ô∏è

Your LangChain.js agents and chains can now pull in local information with the @Google Places API!

Use it to find addresses, websites, and more from text about a location in @LangChainAI ü¶úüîó JS/TS 0.0.200.

Thank you SananR!

https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/tools/google_places

item.title: A great overview of how we added long term memory to OpenGPTs!!
item.description:
A great overview of how we added long term memory to OpenGPTs!!


Shubham Saboo:‚ÄÇOpenGPT meets Generative Agents to get Long term Memory ü§Ø

Opensource community is once again ahead of the curve, breaking new ground in building custom GPTs. This time, it's about adding long-term memory to OpenGPT.

Here's everything you need to know:

1. Specialized Long-Term‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1730810920207622610

RT‚ÄÇJames Briggs
Free course from @DataCamp! Covering essentials of LLMs through to building full AI pipelines with @LangChainAI @pinecone and more :)


DataCamp:‚ÄÇWhether you're completely new to AI or are looking to add generative AI skills to your tool belt, we've designed these codealongs for coders by coders.

Anyone with intermediate Python knowledge can jump in and start learning.
